events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and are excited to start the evaluation process.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster as the candidate has relevant developer experience.
Recruiter John has been assigned to manage this engineering candidate's process and coordinate the next steps accordingly.
Conducted a successful initial screening call focusing on the candidate's software development background and project experience.
The candidate responded promptly confirming their availability and enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next Monday, focusing on backend developer skills and system design.
